entry.title: baby, what's mine is now yours
entry.summary:
Author: Neuqe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,354Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: “If we get married, you’ll probably mess up,” Buck says, almost matter-of-factly.As if he was reciting the weather forecast for tomorrow. Seventy degrees and sunny, you will mess up when it comes to our marriage, both inevitable and predictable. No surprises there.Eddie’s heart sinks.He doesn’t blame Buck for saying it, he knows that Buck knows all the ways he let Shannon down, how messy and imperfect all of his previous relationships have been, and he just straight-up confessed that he isn’t good at being a husband.Still, he guesses that he hoped that Buck would say something comforting, something different.

entry.title: sleep syrup
entry.summary:
Author: buckasagirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,477Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: “No one is expecting you to be the same after what happened. Maybe Bobby wanted you to take care of us, but that doesn’t mean we can’t take care of you too.”“Will you stay with me?”“Yeah,” Eddie agrees immediately. He slides off the bed, turns off the lamp he must have turned on when he came in, and walks around to the other side. He lies on his back in the bed, close enough to the center for Buck to wordlessly move himself into Eddie’s side. Eddie lifts an arm to allow Buck to come closer. “Of course,” He says as he drops his arm to wrap around Buck’s shoulders, effectively making him rest his head on Eddie’s chest, “Always.” Or, despite everyone escaping the lab alive, Buck can't stop reliving the worst case scenarios when he closes his eyes.(Bobby alive)

entry.title: walls come tumbling down
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,321Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 86

Summary: “Look how easy you take it. You’re a natural.”The man’s other hand strokes up and down Eddie’s thigh, steadying him like he’s a skittish, cornered animal. Christ—he’s more than cornered. He’s pinned in place, displayed like a butterfly under glass.Eddie’s left foot twitches, tugging testily at the leather restraint that’s holding it in place. There’s a little give, but not much. Even if he wanted to, there’s no way he’d be able to get enough leverage to pull himself free if he tried.He has safeguards in place—an easy out the moment he wants it. But fuck, he doesn’t want it. Eddie wants this. He wants the fingers inside him. He wants the cock he knows will come after.OREddie in a wall — Czech fantasy glory hole style. Anyone could be on the other side. Anyone.

entry.title: Reader's Digest
entry.summary:
Author: bobbys_bonnet

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,055Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 4

Summary: “Who are you then?”“I don’t–”“What do you know yourself to be? You’re a dad. You’re a firefighter. What else?”“…I was a husband.”“Who are you now, Eddie? Are you a chef? A reader? A hiker?”Eddie laughs, feels wetness at the corners of his eyes. He wishes he was. He wishes he had been, at any point in his life. But the pieces of his ‘self’ are bigger, aren’t so split amongst things like hobbies. They’re broken up into the bigger pieces, the ones with the sharp edges.“I can’t cook and I never had time to read.” Eddie scoffs, feeling his lips pull, “But I like telenovelas,”Frank smiles and it feels genuine. In the way that sadness creeps into the edges of it. Or the 5v1 fic that started as something small and became something so much bigger.

entry.title: lover come over
entry.summary:
Author: sh3llf_liffe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,176Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley just went platinum for the third time, he’s topping the charts again and again, his diaristic and diverse album collections only growing in popularity and sales. What he blames on personal shortcomings, his fame truly skyrocketed after his worst moments were posted for all the world to see during the Tour Bus Bombing, but having his name and picture plastered on every news station and magazine for four months really made it hard not to know at least his top three songs. Now, a new tour is starting and Eddie Diaz, bodyguard and former army medic, comes into the picture.Buck may come off as a suave singer who had it all and is battling through recovery, but he’s been fighting to keep his head above water since his teens. Eddie has a way of getting through this unserious exterior, but can he handle all of the grief that he’s bottled up for so long? cw: past child death and adult suicide discussed and described, last voicemail of dead adult played

Summary: Eddie felt eyes on him, Buck’s eyes specifically. He turned to find the taller man staring at his ass with a curious and confused expression, the same face he makes when he helps Chris with his math. “You good there Buck?” He asked, putting the last bit of his freshly cleaned laundry into his chest of drawers.“Mhm,” He hummed an affirmative, still staring at his butt. “Hey Eddie, do people with big butts have a deeper butt crack or are their assholes just further out?”The man opened and closed his mouth a few times, trying to process the words just said to him. What's almost worse is that he was now wondering the same thing. He hadn’t been paying attention to the depth of his past girlfriends butt cheeks so it wasn’t like he had any data to analyze on the matter. “You know what Buck, I don’t actually know.”“You think we can test it? You’ve got a magnificently sized ass and mine is pretty average I think so I can be the control and you can be the test subject.” The blonde suggested.“Do you think we should check now? entry.title: Between his hands - Part. 6 - Submission
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,307Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 41

Summary: Where secrets, fears, and unexpected desires shatter the delicate balance of their relationship.After the ordeals that nearly cost him his life, Buck has managed to rebuild himself. His body has healed, his certification is validated, and Eddie's love has given him the strength to get back on his feet. But a persistent pain forces him to seek a medical opinion, and the ensuing revelations shake his entire world.Buck finds himself facing a choice that confronts his deepest fears. He believes he must give up his old life, Eddie's love, everything he has built. But Eddie, more determined than ever, won't let him go. He wants the world with him, and he is ready to do anything to convince him that their future has just begun.Will Buck be able to accept being loved for who he is, and embrace this new, unexpected life, filled with doubts, joy, and fears?I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,557Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 35

Summary: A collection of interconnected one-shots set in the same universe as The Good I’ll Do. You don’t have to read the original to follow along, but it definitely helps if you want to understand the full dynamics. Think of it as the bonus footage…same universe, different little moments, all tangled up together.

entry.title: Always mine (Always yours)
entry.summary:
Author: Newbie429

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,947Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 133

Summary: Ever since Eddie was nineteen he had a will created. At first it was just to make sure that Shannon and Chris were set in case anything bad happened to him. Then he updated it in LA to add Buck to itHe knew everyone at the 118 had one. Even Buck. But he was surprised when he found out that he was in Bucks will and what he was set to receive.
